title: QA Intern
description:
Note: This position is strictly for freshers or recent graduates (0–1 year experience). Experienced candidates will not be considered.

At Pexaworks, we don’t just build software—we create seamless digital experiences. From AI\\-driven solutions to mobile and web applications, we ensure everything runs smoothly. Now, we’re looking for a Manual QA Intern to help us maintain high\\-quality standards and deliver flawless products.

If you’re eager to sharpen your testing skills, work on real\\-world projects, and collaborate with a team that takes quality seriously, keep reading.

What You’ll Be Doing

* Test Planning \\& Execution – Create and execute test cases to identify bugs and ensure software quality.
* Bug Tracking \\& Reporting – Log issues, document test results, and work with developers to resolve them.
* Functional \\& Regression Testing – Ensure new features work as expected and don’t break existing functionality.
* User Experience Testing – Think like an end user and provide feedback on usability.
* Collaboration \\& Process Improvement – Work with developers, designers, and product managers to enhance testing workflows.

What We’re Looking For

* Currently pursuing (or recently completed) a degree in CS, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Strong attention to detail and a problem\\-solving mindset.
* Basic understanding of software testing concepts and methodologies.
* Familiarity with test case creation, bug reporting, and tracking tools (such as Jira, Trello, or similar).
* Ability to follow structured testing processes and document findings clearly.
* A team player who can collaborate and communicate effectively.

Why You’ll Love It Here

* Real Projects – No busywork—get hands\\-on experience testing real\\-world applications.
* Experienced Mentors – Work with a team that’s ready to help you grow.
* Flexible \\& Remote\\-Friendly – Work on your schedule.
* Career Growth – If you excel, this internship could be just the beginning.
* Impact – Your testing efforts will directly contribute to better user experiences.

description:
Job description for Team Leader\\-Exp 2\\-3 Years – SynAgro Naturals\\-LLP Based at Pune

**Company Overview:**

SynAgro\\-LLP is a premier producer of high\\-quality mushrooms, dedicated to sustainability and innovation in the agriculture industry. We are looking for a proactive and organized Administrative and Production Support Specialist to assist our production team and ensure smooth operations in our mushroom plant.

**Job Summary:** The Administrative and Production Support Specialist will be responsible for providing administrative support to the production team, managing documentation, coordinating activities, and ensuring efficient communication between departments. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

**Key Responsibilities:**

Administrative Support:

1\\. **Office Management:**

* Manage day\\-to\\-day administrative functions in the production office.
* Maintain office supplies and ensure that the production team has the necessary resources.

2\\. **Documentation and Reporting:**

* Prepare and maintain production reports, logs, and records.
* Assist in the documentation of production processes, quality control measures, and standard operating procedures (SOPs).
* Ensure all documentation is accurate, up\\-to\\-date, and properly filed.

3\\. **Communication:**

* Serve as a point of contact between the production team and other departments, such as HR, finance, and procurement.
* Facilitate effective communication and information flow within the production team.
* Schedule and coordinate meetings, prepare agendas, and take minutes.

Production Support:

1\\. **Coordination:**

* Assist in the scheduling and coordination of production activities to ensure smooth workflow.
* Coordinate with the procurement team to ensure timely delivery of raw materials and supplies.
* Monitor production schedules and report any discrepancies or delays to the Production Manager.

2\\. **Inventory Management:**

* Maintain inventory records of raw materials, packaging, and finished products.
* Conduct regular inventory checks and assist in inventory audits.
* Ensure proper storage and handling of materials in compliance with safety standards.

3\\. **Health and Safety:**

* Assist in the implementation and monitoring of health and safety protocols.
* Ensure that safety regulations are adhered to by all team members.
* Coordinate safety training sessions and maintain records of safety compliance.

4\\. **Quality Control:**

* Support the quality control team in monitoring and documenting quality standards.
* Assist in conducting quality checks and audits to ensure product quality.
* Report any quality issues or deviations to the Quality Control Manager.

Support Functions:

1\\. **Training and Onboarding:**

* Assist in the onboarding and training of new production staff.
* Provide administrative support for training sessions, including scheduling, materials preparation, and record\\-keeping.

2\\. **Data Management:**

* Enter and maintain data related to production activities, inventory, and quality control in relevant systems.
* Generate reports and analyze data to support decision\\-making processes.

3\\. **Continuous Improvement:**

* Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to enhance production efficiency and effectiveness.
* Provide suggestions for process improvements and support their implementation.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Commerce, Agriculture, Industrial Management, or a related field.
* Proven experience in an administrative or support role, preferably in a production or agricultural setting.
* Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Proficiency in using office software (e.g., MS Office).
* Attention to detail and accuracy in documentation.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Knowledge of health and safety regulations is a plus.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary.
* Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
* Supportive and collaborative work environment.

**How to Apply:** Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their relevant experience and why they are a good fit for this role to hrd@bagalkotcement.com.

**SynAgro LLP is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.**

**Job Type:** Full\\-Time, On\\-site

**About the Company**

ArthCycle Labs is a fast\\-growing **personal care and cosmetic manufacturing startup** based in Surat. We develop and produce **shampoos, conditioners, lotions, body washes, and lip balms** for B2B and retail clients across India.

We’re looking for an energetic **Sales Manager** with strong **FMCG experience (3–5 years)** to lead sales, grow distribution, and build our brand presence in new markets.

**Responsibilities:**

**Distribution \\& Channel Management**

* Appoint and manage distributors, wholesalers, and key retailers.

**Client Relationship \\& Negotiation**

**Key Requirements**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field.

* Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
* Ability to analyze market data and build actionable sales strategies.
* Proficiency in MS Excel, CRM tools, and sales reporting systems.
* Willingness to travel for client meetings and market development.

**Preferred Personality Traits**

* Target\\-driven and self\\-motivated with high ownership mindset.
* Strategic thinker who also enjoys on\\-ground sales execution.
* Excellent relationship builder and problem\\-solver.
* Thrives in a dynamic, growth\\-oriented startup environment.

**What We Offer**

* Direct exposure to **brand building, channel expansion, and institutional sales**.
* Flat, transparent culture with autonomy and growth opportunities.

JOB DESCRIPTION* Ensure purchase requisitions (PR) accurately reflect the required material specifications, quantities, and prices.
* Verify existing stock levels and aging inventory prior to raising purchase orders (PO); coordinate liquidation plans where necessary.
* Collaborate with Technical Managers, Product Managers, and Suppliers to confirm pricing before placing orders.
* Maintain complete tracking of the PR process and ensure smooth conversion into PO.
* Share POs with suppliers and provide regular status updates to relevant branches.
* Coordinate with suppliers for scheduling and ensure on\\-time delivery of materials.
* Amend POs only when required for GRN (Goods Receipt Note) processing or upon supplier request.
* Manage PO closure as directed.
* Support customer coordination when required.
* Prepare and share weekly sales reports with Technical and Product Managers across regions.
* Collect necessary data in collaboration with managers and suppliers for new item creation; monitor approval status.
* Follow up on the GRN process for received materials.
* Generate and track daily PO reports for monitoring progress.
* Liaise with transporters to arrange vehicles and confirm freight charges with Branch Managers and the Reporting Manager.
* Assign Inventory Organization (Inventory Org) codes for materials when required.
* Respond promptly to inquiries regarding PO status from branches and managers.
* Process international purchase orders, including air and sea shipments. and follow up for clearance.
* Coordinate with the Finance team for supplier payments.
* Handle LC (Letter of Credit) processing for shipments under LC payment terms.
* Provide projections to the manufacturing plant for Purecryl and ensure smooth inward processing up to GRN.
* Initiate supplier creation requests for new vendors when necessary.

**Job Description – Intern Flutter Developer**

**About App Knit:**  
App Knit is a leading **Mobile Application Development Company** based in Chandigarh, dedicated to delivering high\\-quality applications for clients worldwide. With a team of **35 skilled professionals** and 5 years of industry experience, we specialise in crafting top\\-notch mobile applications using the latest design patterns and coding structures. We are seeking a passionate **Flutter Developer Intern** who thrives in a collaborative environment and is eager to enhance their skills through continuous learning. This opportunity is ideal for individuals who want to build a rewarding career in mobile app development.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design and implement new app modules based on product requirements using the **Flutter framework**.
* Develop reusable code and libraries for future use.
* Collaborate with UI/UX designers to build user interfaces.
* Integrate user\\-interface components developed by other team members.
* Write clean, testable, and efficient code.
* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams to develop and deploy applications.
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.

**Required Candidate Profile:**

**What We Offer:**

* Practical, hands\\-on experience with the latest technologies.

If you are an enthusiastic developer with the drive to learn and grow, this is the perfect opportunity for you. Join us and be a part of our exciting journey!

title: Delivery partner
description:
**Responsibilities:\\-**

1\\. Order Pickup \\& Delivery – Collect orders from the pickup point (restaurant, store, or warehouse) and deliver them safely to the customer’s location on time.

2\\. Route Planning – Choose the most efficient and safe route for timely deliveries.

3\\. Customer Interaction – Maintain polite and professional communication with customers during delivery.

4\\. Verification – Confirm order details such as customer name, address, and payment method before delivery.

5\\. Payment Handling – Collect cash on delivery (if applicable) and ensure proper handover of collected payments.

6\\. Safety Compliance – Follow traffic rules, wear safety gear (helmet, uniform, ID card), and maintain a valid driving license.

7\\. Product Handling – Ensure that the products (especially food or fragile items) are handled carefully to avoid damage or spillage.

8\\. Reporting \\& Updates – Update delivery status in the app or inform the manager about completed or pending deliveries.

9\\. Vehicle Maintenance – Keep the delivery vehicle (bike, scooter, or van) clean, fueled, and in good working condition.

10\\. Customer Satisfaction – Strive to provide a positive delivery experience to ensure repeat orders and customer trust.

description:
Job description for Field Sales:

We are seeking a highly motivated Field Sales Executive to join our dynamic sales team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for sales, experience in fieldwork, and a strong understanding of IT services, including ERP systems, website development, and other digital solutions. title: SEO Specialist
description:
Job Title: SEO \\& WordPress E\\-commerce Developer (with Paid Media Focus)

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly skilled and results\\-driven individual to manage and enhance our online presence through a combination of website development, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and e\\-commerce growth strategies, with a focus on paid advertising channels like Facebook and Instagram Ads. The ideal candidate is a technical problem\\-solver with a strong grasp of digital marketing, specifically within the e\\-commerce space.

Key Responsibilities

1\\. WordPress \\& E\\-commerce Development

* **Website Management:** Design, develop, and maintain high\\-performing, secure, and responsive WordPress websites, with a primary focus on the **WooCommerce** platform.
* **Technical Implementation:** Write clean, well\\-documented code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP) for custom themes, plugins, and functionality to meet business requirements.
* **Optimization:** Continuously optimize site speed, Core Web Vitals, and overall performance for an optimal user experience (UX) and conversion rate.
* **Integration:** Manage and integrate third\\-party services, APIs, payment gateways, and essential e\\-commerce plugins.
* **Maintenance \\& Security:** Perform regular website backups, security checks, and platform/plugin updates to ensure optimal uptime and security.

2\\. Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

* **Technical SEO:** Conduct regular technical SEO audits (crawlability, indexation, site architecture, structured data/Schema Markup) and collaborate with development to implement fixes.
* **On\\-Page SEO:** Optimize all on\\-page elements, including titles, meta descriptions, headings, and images for targeted e\\-commerce keywords and conversion.
* **Keyword Strategy:** Conduct in\\-depth keyword research for e\\-commerce products, categories, and supporting content (blog) to identify growth opportunities.
* **Monitoring \\& Reporting:** Use tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush/Ahrefs) to track SEO performance, analyze traffic, rankings, and conversions, and provide actionable insights.
* **Content Collaboration:** Work with the content team to ensure all new product and blog content is fully optimized for search intent and SEO best practices.

3\\. Paid Media (Facebook \\& E\\-commerce Ads)

* **Ad Platform Management:** Set up, manage, and optimize advertising campaigns primarily on **Facebook and Instagram Ads** (Meta Ads Manager) to drive e\\-commerce sales and ROI.
* **Pixel \\& Tracking:** Ensure the Facebook Pixel, Conversion API, and other necessary tracking tools are correctly implemented on the WordPress/WooCommerce site for accurate campaign measurement and optimization.
* **Audience Strategy:** Develop and manage effective audience targeting strategies, including custom audiences, lookalike audiences, and re\\-marketing campaigns.
* **A/B Testing:** Design and execute A/B tests on ad creatives, copy, targeting, and landing pages to continuously improve campaign performance.
* **Budget Management:** Monitor ad spend daily, adjust bids, and manage campaign budgets to meet key performance indicators (KPIs) for Cost Per Acquisition (CPA) and Return on Ad Spend (ROAS).

Required Skills \\& Qualifications

* **Proven Experience:** \\[X] years of demonstrable experience in WordPress Development, specifically with **WooCommerce** for e\\-commerce.
* **Technical Proficiency:** Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Experience with theme customization and building custom WordPress functionality.
* **SEO Expertise:** In\\-depth knowledge of technical, on\\-page, and off\\-page SEO best practices and ability to translate data into optimization strategies.
* **Paid Media Knowledge:** Solid working knowledge of managing and optimizing campaigns in **Meta Ads Manager (Facebook/Instagram Ads)**, including setting up and troubleshooting the Facebook Pixel.
* **E\\-commerce Focused:** Deep understanding of the e\\-commerce sales funnel, conversion rate optimization (CRO), and user experience (UX) on online stores.
* **Analytics Tools:** Proficiency with Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and at least one major SEO tool (SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz, etc.).
* **Problem\\-Solver:** Excellent troubleshooting and debugging skills across both website development and ad tracking.
* **Communication:** Strong verbal and written communication skills to articulate technical issues and marketing performance to non\\-technical stakeholders.

Preferred (Bonus) Qualifications

* Experience with other e\\-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopify, Magento).
* Experience with other PPC platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Bing Ads).
* Familiarity with Git or other version control systems.
* Certification in a relevant field (e.g., Google Ads, Google Analytics, Yoast SEO).

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher, Internship

Pay: ₹10,770\\.30 \\- ₹20,000\\.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: WSO QUALITY CONTROL, ANALYST
description:
**About the Role:**  

**Grade Level (for internal use):** 07
  
  

**The Team:**  

Solutions Operations is the industry leader in leveraged loan, private equity and high\\-yield solutions and provides comprehensive products and services for portfolio management, administration, reporting, and analysis. Through our numerous platforms, managed services, or full outsourcing to front to back\\-office functions, Solutions Operations offers flexible and unique solutions tailored to client needs.
  
  

**The Impact:**  

S\\&P Global has an opening for an analytical and detail\\-oriented individual to handle data maintenance, support, training, reporting, and business analysis activities for clients’ Structured Finance Obligations, including CLOs, CBOs, and Swaps. The position offers exposure to external industry entities such as portfolio managers, custodians, and agent banks. Candidate should display strong financial adaptability, PC skills, and expect full accountabilities for all assigned projects.
  
  

**What’s in it for you:**  

An individual will be aligned within our finance operations vertical and will be responsible to manage daily BAU, conducting analysis and reconciling client transactions. You will be communicating with global business partners to understand changes in process and implementing process changes in\\-house.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Provide quality control for data processed within the WSO environments.
  
  

Process trade settlement in WSO Admin as well as new borrowings, increases, rollovers, pay downs, commitment reductions, etc. maintain current accuracy standards based on the information provided by client.
  
  

Responsible for accurately processing daily activity, new deal closings, restructures, and amendments for all asset types (Loans, Bonds, ABS, Equities, CDS) by reviewing source documentation and faxes from agent banks.
  
  

Process interest, commitment fees and investigate discrepancies when necessary.
  
  

Review system generated reports to ensure proper monitoring of the facilities and handle exceptions items.
  
  

Interact with appropriate individuals/entities to gather all pertinent information/details to reflect date accurately in the system.
  
  

Handle requests from different departments/clients within an hour turn around. Complete special projects as assigned.
  
  

Creativity to go beyond current tools to deliver the best solution to the problem, ability and comfort with working independently and making key decisions on projects and business critical activities.
  
  

**What We’re Looking For:**  

Fresher or At least One year of relevant, industry experience.
  
  

The requirement is in night shift.
  
  

Bachelor’s from accredited institution or equivalent work experience needed
  
  

Business/Finance/Accounting strongly recommended
  
  

Strong Computer skills – Microsoft Office suite
  
  

Strong work ethic – organized, detail oriented, analytical, task driven
  
  

About S\\&P Global Market Intelligence
  
  

At S\\&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S\\&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.
  
  

For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence .
  
  

What’s In It For You?
  
  

**Our Purpose:**  

Progress is not a self\\-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology–the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.
  
  

Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S\\&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.
  
  

**Our People:**  

We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.
  
  

From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We’re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
  
  

**Our Values:**  

Integrity, Discovery, Partnership
  
  

At S\\&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
  
  

**Benefits:**  

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S\\&P Global.
  
  

**Our benefits include:**  

**Health \\& Wellness:** Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
  
  

**Flexible Downtime:** Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
  
  

**Continuous Learning:** Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
  
  

**Invest in Your Future:** Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
  
  

**Family Friendly Perks:** It’s not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
  
  

**Beyond the Basics:** From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.
  
**For more information on benefits by country visit:** https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
  
  

**Global Hiring and Opportunity at S\\&P Global:**  

At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
  
  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert:**  

If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com . S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, “pre\\-employment training” or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here .

title: AREA SALES MANAGER - Kochi
description:
An area sales manager is responsible for overseeing and driving sales activities in a specific geographic region, managing a team of sales representatives, and working toward targeted revenue goals through strategic planning and leadership.

Core Responsibilities

* Create,Guide, train, and motivate a sales team to achieve region\\-specific sales targets.
* Develop and implement sales strategies tailored to the assigned territory.
* Review sales data, generate reports, and present insights to senior managers for further action.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective customers through presentations and follow\\-ups.
* Conduct market research to stay updated with industry trends and competitor activity.
* Monitor, assess, and optimize the performance of sales representatives within the region.
* Establish and expand the customer base while ensuring consistent product/service quality across locations.

title: Python Backend Developer
description:
**Location:** On\\-Site / Hybrid (Hyderabad)  
**Employment Type:** Full\\-Time / Contract

**About Seraphix**  
Seraphix is a rapidly growing **IT Services and Consulting company** based in Hyderabad, building **high\\-quality digital products and scalable software solutions** using modern technologies.  
We believe in **dedication, continuous learning, and technical excellence** — because when our people grow, our products thrive. Every project here is an opportunity to **push limits, learn fast, and build better**. You’ll be part of a team that values **clarity, precision, and engineering discipline**, while constantly improving and experimenting.  
If you’re driven by clean architecture, elegant systems, and technical challenges — you’ll fit right in.

**About the Role**

We’re looking for a **Python Backend Developer** to design, develop, and maintain scalable backend systems that power our web and mobile products.

You’ll be responsible for crafting robust APIs, optimizing database operations, and ensuring the **security, performance, and reliability** of production systems. This role demands a strong understanding of backend architecture, hands\\-on coding ability, and the discipline to build for the long term.

You’ll collaborate closely with **frontend developers, designers, and product managers** to align backend functionality with product goals and deliver seamless user experiences.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design, build, and maintain **scalable, secure, and modular backend systems** using Python (Django, FastAPI, or Flask).
* Develop and document **RESTful APIs** and ensure smooth integration with web and mobile clients.
* Optimize **database performance**, queries, and schema design for PostgreSQL/MySQL.
* Integrate **third\\-party APIs and external services** (payments, notifications, authentication, etc.).
* Implement **authentication, authorization, and data security** using JWT, OAuth, or session\\-based methods.
* Handle **asynchronous processing** with Celery, Redis, or message brokers like Kafka.
* Implement **caching, rate limiting, and API performance tuning** for large\\-scale systems.
* Deploy, monitor, and maintain applications on **Linux\\-based servers** and cloud environments (AWS preferred).
* Write and maintain **unit/integration tests** using Pytest or Django Test Framework.
* Collaborate with the frontend and design teams for smooth API integration and version management.
* Participate in **code reviews, documentation, and continuous improvement cycles**.

**Requirements**

* **6 months – 3 years** of professional experience in backend development using **Python**.
* Strong experience with **Django / FastAPI / Flask**, ORM handling, and REST API design.
* Proficient with **PostgreSQL / MySQL**, migrations, indexing, and query optimization.
* Solid understanding of **authentication, authorization**, and API security standards.
* Experience with **Redis**, **Celery**, and **background task orchestration**.
* Familiar with **Docker**, **Git**, and deployment via **Nginx \\+ Gunicorn / Uvicorn**.
* Skilled in **API testing tools** (Postman, Insomnia) and debugging workflows.
* Familiarity with **frontend integration** concepts (React / HTML / JS).
* Strong Linux command\\-line and server management skills — SSH, SCP, rsync, bash scripting.
* Understanding of **real\\-time communication** (WebSockets, long polling) and async I/O patterns.

**Preferred Skills**

* Experience setting up **CI/CD pipelines** (GitHub Actions / GitLab CI).
* Familiarity with **AWS, GCP, or Azure** deployment environments.
* Experience integrating **payment gateways**, **SMS/email APIs**, or **healthcare integrations**.
* Knowledge of **data encryption**, **MFA**, and **secure API authentication** (Google / Apple Sign\\-In).
* Experience with **transactional email systems** (SMTP).
* Understanding of **rate limiting**, **load testing**, and **backend profiling** (Locust, k6, JMeter).
* Exposure to **asynchronous frameworks** like FastAPI for high\\-performance APIs.

**What You’ll Get**

* Work on **real, production\\-grade systems** that scale and evolve.
* Collaborate with a **highly technical, growth\\-focused team**.
* Build solutions across **AI, data systems, and cloud infrastructures**.
* Access to **learning\\-driven mentorship** and career growth opportunities.
* Competitive compensation aligned with skill and technical impact.

**To Apply:** Send your resume, GitHub/portfolio link, and a short note to **careers@seraphix.in**

**Company:** Seraphix Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹96,000\\.00 \\- ₹300,000\\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Paid sick time
* Work from home

Application Question(s):

* When can you start working?
* Current or Previous Salary (Monthly)?

(If you're a fresher or just graduated, feel free to leave this blank — no worries!)

* Do you have experience with Celery workers and Redis?

(If yes, briefly tell us how you've used them. If not, are you willing to learn?)

* Any experience working with Kafka?

(Optional, but a good bonus if you do! A simple yes/no or a quick example is fine.)

* Have you ever been involved in designing backend architecture?

(If not, are you keen to take up such responsibilities in future projects?)

* Are you comfortable deploying applications on AWS?

(We’d love to know your familiarity — even if it’s just a basic understanding.)

* What payment gateway integrations have you worked on?

(Just mention any payment providers you’ve integrated with — even if it’s one.)

* How much experience do you have with Django REST Framework (DRF)?

(This is important — so give us a brief idea of your comfort level.)

* Year of Graduation?

(This is just to understand your experience timeline — fresher or experienced, all are welcome!)

* Have you written or worked on testing for your backend code? (Unit tests, API tests, etc.)

(This can be automated or manual testing. Just tell us how comfortable you are in ensuring code quality.)

Experience:

* Django: 1 year (Preferred)

Location:

* Hyderabad, Telangana (Preferred)

Shift availability:

* Day Shift (Preferred)
* Night Shift (Preferred)
* Overnight Shift (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

title: Associate Content Editor - Reference Master
description:
**Associate Content Editor – Reference Master**
 We are looking for an Associate Content Editor to join our Reference Master team in Chennai. This is an amazing opportunity to work on Dissertation and Theses products. The team consists of 15 colleagues and reports to the Content Team Manager. We have a great skill set in Citation and we would love to speak with you if you have the skills to curate bibliographic content.
   

  

**About You**
* Must be an undergraduate degree holder in B.com, B.Sc., BBA, BA, BCA, etc. (apply only if you have received the degree results/course completion certificate)
* Must be a fresher who can communicate \\& comprehend English on a professional level.


**It would be great if you also had . . .**
* Experiences from the publishing industry will be an added advantage.
* Skilled in typing and content analysis.


**What will you be doing in this role?**
* Curate bibliographic information such as Author, Editor Volume, Page, and Corresponding Titles from dissertations and theses received from participating universities.
* Expected to follow prescribed editorial policies, procedures, and instructions to capture the bibliographic information with required quality metrics.
* Colleague is expected to have good communication skills, typing skills and a high level of attention to detail.
* Expected to have the ability and willingness to do repetitive work in a highly productive environment.


**Product**
 This is an exciting opportunity for graduates to join and be a part of the global team of the “ProQuest Dissertations and Theses” product, which caters to innovators and researchers. As an Associate Content Editor, you will work with the Reference Master content operations team for the PQDT product.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Reference Master Team members are accountable for curating the reference records identified from various sources including academic literature, and bibliographic content. We are a multi\\-talented \\& multicultural team of 15 people who work collectively to contribute to the overall product. We are a team with a Content Manager and Team Manager.
   

  

**Hours of Work \\-** 
 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (including 1 hr break)
   

  

**The current mode of work** 
 \\- Hybrid

title: Architectural Drafter
description:
**About Us**

At **Sana Structure Makers Pvt. Ltd.**, we specialize in creating stylish, functional, and timeless spaces that blend creativity with precision. From residential interiors to large\\-scale commercial projects, our work focuses on bringing design visions to life with **accuracy, speed, and quality**.

description:
We are looking for an Electrical MEP Draftsman, who can create detailed electrical drawings and schematics, working closely with engineers and project managers to bring projects from concept to completion.

**Responsibilities**

* Develop detailed electrical schematics, wiring diagrams, and layouts.
* Ensure all drawings comply with industry standards and project specifications.
* Collaborate with engineers to interpret project requirements and convert them into technical plans.
* Revise drawings and plans to accommodate changes and updates in project scope.
* Maintain and update drawing databases and document control systems.
* Conduct site visits to gather information and verify design requirements.
* Assist in the preparation of project proposals and bid documents.

**Qualifications**

* ITI or Diploma in Electrical Engineering or related field.
* Fresher or experience as an Electrical Draftsman or similar role.
* Strong understanding of electrical design principles and standards.
* Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., AutoCAD, Revit).
* Excellent attention to detail and precision in work.
* Good communication and teamwork skills.
* Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: ₹10,000\\.00 \\- ₹20,000\\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Paid time off

Work Location: In person

title: Process Engineer-Water Treatment
description:
**Job Description: Process Engineer – Water Treatment**

**Position:** Process Engineer – Water Treatment  
**Location:** Chennai  
**Department:** Engineering / Projects  
**Reports To:** Project Manager / Head of Engineering

**Role Overview**

The Process Engineer – Water Treatment will be responsible for the design, development, optimization, and implementation of water and wastewater treatment processes. This role involves preparing process design documents, evaluating treatment technologies, conducting performance analysis, and providing technical support during project execution and commissioning.

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Process Design \\& Engineering**
* Develop **PFDs (Process Flow Diagrams)**, **P\\&IDs (Piping \\& Instrumentation Diagrams)**, hydraulic profiles, and mass balance calculations.
* Select appropriate treatment technologies (ETP, STP, RO, ZLD, MBR, DAF, etc.) based on project requirements.
* Design and size process equipment such as pumps, blowers, tanks, reactors, clarifiers, membranes, and filters.
* Develop detailed process design reports, datasheets, and technical specifications.
* **Project Execution \\& Support**
* Provide process engineering support during procurement, fabrication, installation, and commissioning phases.
* Review vendor drawings and ensure compliance with process requirements.
* Conduct pilot studies, jar tests, and lab\\-scale trials for technology validation.
* Ensure adherence to environmental regulations and client specifications.
* **Optimization \\& Troubleshooting**
* Evaluate plant performance and suggest improvements for energy efficiency, water recovery, and OPEX reduction.
* Troubleshoot operational challenges in existing treatment plants.
* **Documentation \\& Compliance**
* Prepare O\\&M manuals, process control philosophies, and start\\-up procedures.
* Ensure compliance with **ISO standards, safety norms, and statutory requirements**.

**Qualifications \\& Skills**

* **Education:**
* Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in Chemical Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related field.
* **Experience:**
* 3–8 years of experience in water/wastewater treatment process design and engineering (freshers with strong technical skills may also be considered for junior roles).
* Hands\\-on experience with **ETP, STP, RO, UF, MBR, ZLD, DAF, Demineralization, and other advanced treatment systems**.
* **Technical Skills:**
* Strong knowledge of process modeling and simulation tools (AutoCAD, Aspen, MATLAB, or equivalent).
* Proficiency in MS Office and engineering design software.
* Familiarity with relevant standards (CPHEEO, BIS, USEPA, WHO guidelines).
* **Soft Skills:**
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Ability to work in cross\\-functional teams.
* Good communication, reporting, and client interaction skills.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹20,000\\.00 \\- ₹35,000\\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Food provided

Work Location: In person

title: Technical Coordinator
description:
**Job Title:** Technical Coordinator  
**Company:** FLP Labs (powered by MEC Robotics)  
**Location: Bangalore**

Are you passionate about technology and eager to inspire the next generation of innovators?  
The **Technical Coordinator** will be responsible for providing technical support and coordination to ensure the smooth delivery of STEM training programs. This role involves collaborating with educators, STEM trainers, and various stakeholders to maintain and improve the technical aspects of training sessions, ensuring an engaging and effective learning environment for students.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Coordinate and manage all aspects of STEM training sessions, including scheduling, resource allocation, and logistics.
* Collaborate with STEM trainers and educators to ensure the alignment of content with the curriculum and learning objectives.
* Monitor the progress of training programs and provide timely reports to program managers or directors.
* Provide technical assistance to STEM trainers during training sessions, ensuring all equipment, software, and online platforms are functioning correctly.
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to equipment, software, or connectivity during training sessions.
* Maintain and update technical tools and resources, including hardware, software, and digital learning platforms.
* Assist in the development and customization of STEM training materials, ensuring they are aligned with educational standards and best practices.
* Ensure the integration of emerging technologies and innovations in STEM education into the training programs.
* Work closely with STEM trainers, program managers, and other team members to develop strategies for continuous improvement in STEM training delivery.
* Liaise with external vendors or service providers to procure necessary technical resources, tools, or training materials.
* Collect and analyze data on training outcomes, technical performance, and learner engagement.
* Provide regular feedback on the effectiveness of the training programs and suggest improvements based on data and observations.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest developments in STEM education, tools, and technologies.
* Participate in training and workshops to enhance technical and instructional skills.
* **Programming Skills:** Proficient in Python and block\\-based programming languages for developing and debugging interactive STEM projects.
* **Hardware Expertise:** Hands\\-on experience with Arduino, ESP32, and Raspberry Pi for building and integrating electronic prototypes.

**Qualification**

Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Engineering, Computer Science, Education, or a STEM\\-related discipline).

* Minimum 2 years of experience in a technical coordination or support role in a STEM\\-focused environment.
* Experience with educational technology, online learning platforms, and technical troubleshooting.

**How to Apply:**  
If you are a proactive technical leader with a passion for education and innovation, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your updated resume.

**Contact details:**

**Email:** flpeducation2023@gmail.com

**Ph no:**\\+918606442892

title: Graduate Electrical Engineer
description:
**Got a flair for the complex? We’re hunting for a Graduate Electrical Engineer with an understanding of detailed engineering design to join our outstanding Mumbai based team.**

**Here at Buro Happold, expect the exceptional.**

* From the projects you will work on to the clients we work with. From career\\-defining opportunities to an inclusive and diverse practice where we all contribute to a more equitable world. From our reputation to our relationships. Wherever your Buro Happold career takes you, it’ll be anything but ordinary.

**Your next role**

* Undertake detailed engineering design.
* Learning to create electrical engineering designs and calculations (using both software and knowledge to verify calculations).
* Developing skill to create compelling narratives around your work to explain to non\\-technical people your ideas.
* Demonstrate an ability to work and cooperate effectively with others.
* Plan and help manage CAD \\& REVIT documentation of design work.
* Under guidance of senior staff, represent Buro Happold at meetings with the client, other professionals and suppliers.
* Ensure service and project work are carried out within agreed deadlines and within budget.
* Ensure that appropriate service/design decisions are met.
* Ensure senior staff are kept informed of important and relevant service/design decisions and the objectives of the company and the client are achieved.
* Coordinating his/her work with other members of the project team.
* Ensuring all relevant Buro Happold staff are informed of client matters.
* Continually ensuring that practices, policies, strategy and services represent the client’s and Buro Happold’s best interests and that Buro Happold policy is in keeping with current legislation, Indian Standards and Codes of Practice etc.
* Ensure Maintaining awareness of project budgets and raising any concerns regarding budgetary or financial issues.
* Senior staff are kept informed of important and relevant service/design decisions.
* Ensuring all necessary Buro Happold staff are informed of relevant client matters.
* Responsible for planning, organising and managing personal workload in order to meet deadlines in line with managers requirements.
* Proactively raising concerns regarding workload and ability to meet deadline

**Your skills and experience**

* MTech (Electrical / Power Systems) fresher.
* Ability to accept a degree of responsibility in a team\\-based organisation, combined with ability to work independently.
* Microsoft Office, specifically Excel (a detailed understanding including the use of macros).
* Experience using common analysis software (including or similar to CSC Fastrak, TEDDS, ROBOT, ETABS and SAFE) and willingness to quickly learn to use these analysis packages if required.
* The applicant will need to have strong interpersonal and organisational skills.
* Ability to propose multiple solutions to Clients and objectively summarise the benefits and shortfalls of each.

**What we offer you**

* Bring your knowledge and expertise to one of the world’s most respected consultancies.
* Competitive salary and benefits package including Annual Discretionary Bonus, Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme for both you and your family, Group Personal Accident Cover
* Our 5\\-day workweek policy supports work\\-life balance, ensuring you have time to relax and recharge.
* A strong commitment to your continuous development. Whatever stage in your career, we have a learning and development programme that will enable and empower you
* Benefit from our Employee Referral Bonus, rewarding you for bringing talented candidates into our fold
* A commitment to your wellbeing through a comprehensive Employee Assistance Programme (EAP) and wellness initiatives designed to support your mental and physical health
* Back to Work Program for Women \\- Swam Siddha \\- We're committed to empowering women, facilitating seamless re\\-entry into the workforce through our dedicated program
* Engage with our vibrant community through the Young Employees Forum, Diversity and Inclusion Forum, and BH Women's Network, fostering a supportive and diverse workplace culture
* Make a difference in the world with our Share Our Skills (SOS) program, offering opportunities to support local communities and those in need globally.
* An International Culture that wherever your career takes you at Buro Happold, you won’t be far from the exceptional.


\\#LI\\-EJ1

**A place for everyone**


Buro Happold values an individual's flexible approaches to working patterns as an important part of the way you work and achieve balance. We welcome applications from those who are seeking flexibility in their careers.


Our exceptional portfolio of projects is the result of the diversity of thought, identities, backgrounds, and experiences that shape us. Appreciating each other’s differences is key, we want employees to feel they don’t have to mask elements of their identity to thrive.


We are working to change the lack of representation of marginalised groups in the built environment and are particularly keen to hear from anyone who feels they are underrepresented in the industry. We have much to learn from one another. Embracing differences allows us to develop the most innovative and elegant solutions.


Please let us know if there are any adjustments we could make to the application process to make it easier and more comfortable for you. Contact IndiaHR@burohappold.com so we can work with you to support you throughout your application.

title: Python Backend Developer
description:
**Location:** On\\-Site / Hybrid (Hyderabad)  
**Employment Type:** Full\\-Time / Contract

**About Seraphix**  
Seraphix is a rapidly growing **IT Services and Consulting company** based in Hyderabad, building **high\\-quality digital products and scalable software solutions** using modern technologies.  
We believe in **dedication, continuous learning, and technical excellence** — because when our people grow, our products thrive. Every project here is an opportunity to **push limits, learn fast, and build better**. You’ll be part of a team that values **clarity, precision, and engineering discipline**, while constantly improving and experimenting.  
If you’re driven by clean architecture, elegant systems, and technical challenges — you’ll fit right in.

**About the Role**

We’re looking for a **Python Backend Developer** to design, develop, and maintain scalable backend systems that power our web and mobile products.

You’ll be responsible for crafting robust APIs, optimizing database operations, and ensuring the **security, performance, and reliability** of production systems. This role demands a strong understanding of backend architecture, hands\\-on coding ability, and the discipline to build for the long term.

You’ll collaborate closely with **frontend developers, designers, and product managers** to align backend functionality with product goals and deliver seamless user experiences.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design, build, and maintain **scalable, secure, and modular backend systems** using Python (Django, FastAPI, or Flask).
* Develop and document **RESTful APIs** and ensure smooth integration with web and mobile clients.
* Optimize **database performance**, queries, and schema design for PostgreSQL/MySQL.
* Integrate **third\\-party APIs and external services** (payments, notifications, authentication, etc.).
* Implement **authentication, authorization, and data security** using JWT, OAuth, or session\\-based methods.
* Handle **asynchronous processing** with Celery, Redis, or message brokers like Kafka.
* Implement **caching, rate limiting, and API performance tuning** for large\\-scale systems.
* Deploy, monitor, and maintain applications on **Linux\\-based servers** and cloud environments (AWS preferred).
* Write and maintain **unit/integration tests** using Pytest or Django Test Framework.
* Collaborate with the frontend and design teams for smooth API integration and version management.
* Participate in **code reviews, documentation, and continuous improvement cycles**.

**Requirements**

* **6 months – 3 years** of professional experience in backend development using **Python**.
* Strong experience with **Django / FastAPI / Flask**, ORM handling, and REST API design.
* Proficient with **PostgreSQL / MySQL**, migrations, indexing, and query optimization.
* Solid understanding of **authentication, authorization**, and API security standards.
* Experience with **Redis**, **Celery**, and **background task orchestration**.
* Familiar with **Docker**, **Git**, and deployment via **Nginx \\+ Gunicorn / Uvicorn**.
* Skilled in **API testing tools** (Postman, Insomnia) and debugging workflows.
* Familiarity with **frontend integration** concepts (React / HTML / JS).
* Strong Linux command\\-line and server management skills — SSH, SCP, rsync, bash scripting.
* Understanding of **real\\-time communication** (WebSockets, long polling) and async I/O patterns.

**Preferred Skills**

* Experience setting up **CI/CD pipelines** (GitHub Actions / GitLab CI).
* Familiarity with **AWS, GCP, or Azure** deployment environments.
* Experience integrating **payment gateways**, **SMS/email APIs**, or **healthcare integrations**.
* Knowledge of **data encryption**, **MFA**, and **secure API authentication** (Google / Apple Sign\\-In).
* Experience with **transactional email systems** (SMTP).
* Understanding of **rate limiting**, **load testing**, and **backend profiling** (Locust, k6, JMeter).
* Exposure to **asynchronous frameworks** like FastAPI for high\\-performance APIs.

**What You’ll Get**

* Work on **real, production\\-grade systems** that scale and evolve.
* Collaborate with a **highly technical, growth\\-focused team**.
* Build solutions across **AI, data systems, and cloud infrastructures**.
* Access to **learning\\-driven mentorship** and career growth opportunities.
* Competitive compensation aligned with skill and technical impact.

**To Apply:** Send your resume, GitHub/portfolio link, and a short note to **careers@seraphix.in**

**Company:** Seraphix Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹96,000\\.00 \\- ₹300,000\\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Paid sick time
* Work from home

Application Question(s):

* When can you start working?
* Current or Previous Salary (Monthly)?

(If you're a fresher or just graduated, feel free to leave this blank — no worries!)

* Do you have experience with Celery workers and Redis?

(If yes, briefly tell us how you've used them. If not, are you willing to learn?)

* Any experience working with Kafka?

(Optional, but a good bonus if you do! A simple yes/no or a quick example is fine.)

* Have you ever been involved in designing backend architecture?

(If not, are you keen to take up such responsibilities in future projects?)

* Are you comfortable deploying applications on AWS?

(We’d love to know your familiarity — even if it’s just a basic understanding.)

* What payment gateway integrations have you worked on?

(Just mention any payment providers you’ve integrated with — even if it’s one.)

* How much experience do you have with Django REST Framework (DRF)?

(This is important — so give us a brief idea of your comfort level.)

* Year of Graduation?

(This is just to understand your experience timeline — fresher or experienced, all are welcome!)

* Have you written or worked on testing for your backend code? (Unit tests, API tests, etc.)

(This can be automated or manual testing. Just tell us how comfortable you are in ensuring code quality.)

Experience:

* Django: 1 year (Preferred)

Location:

* Hyderabad, Telangana (Preferred)

* Day Shift (Preferred)

title: (Only Male) Site Supervisor civil
description:
The Site Supervisor (Civil) will oversee daily operations on construction sites, ensuring projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. This role involves managing teams, coordinating with subcontractors, and ensuring compliance with safety regulations.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Supervise and coordinate daily activities on construction sites, ensuring work is performed according to project specifications and plans.
* Manage and lead a team of workers, providing guidance and support to ensure high productivity and quality of work.
* Monitor project progress, addressing any issues or delays promptly and effectively.
* Conduct regular site inspections to ensure compliance with safety regulations and quality standards.
* Collaborate with project managers, architects, and engineers to discuss project specifications and timelines.
* Maintain accurate records of daily activities, labor hours, and material usage.
* Coordinate with subcontractors and suppliers to ensure timely delivery of materials and services.
* Conduct safety meetings and enforce adherence to safety protocols on\\-site.
* Assist in preparing reports and documentation related to project status, issues, and resolutions.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field (preferred).
* Proven experience as a site supervisor or similar role in the construction industry.
* Strong knowledge of construction processes, safety regulations, and quality standards.
* Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
* Proficiency in project management software and Microsoft Office Suite.
* Ability to read and interpret blueprints and technical drawings.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.

**Physical Requirements:**

* Ability to work outdoors in various weather conditions.
* Must be able to lift heavy materials and equipment as needed.

**Why Join Us?**

title: Business Analyst
description:
1\\.Requirements Gathering: Collaborate with stakeholders, including business users, managers, and IT teams, to understand their needs and gather detailed requirements for new systems or enhancements to existing systems.

2\\.Business Process Analysis: Analyze current business processes, identify inefficiencies or areas for improvement, and propose solutions to streamline operations, increase productivity, or reduce costs.

3\\.Technology Solutions: Evaluate available technology options and propose solutions that align with business goals and requirements. This may involve conducting research, assessing vendor products, and recommending software applications, platforms, or systems.

4\\.System Design and Documentation: Create detailed system specifications, user stories, process flow diagrams, and other documentation to clearly define requirements for developers and technical teams.

5\\.Collaboration and Communication: Serve as a liaison between business users, project managers, and development teams, ensuring effective communication and understanding of requirements throughout the project lifecycle.

6\\.Testing and Quality Assurance: Assist in the development of test plans, participate in system testing, and verify that solutions meet the specified requirements. Identify and resolve any issues or defects in collaboration with developers.

7\\.Training and User Support: Provide training and support to end\\-users on new systems or enhancements, ensuring they understand how to effectively use the technology to meet their business needs.

8\\.Project Management: Collaborate with project managers to define project scope, timelines, and deliverables. Contribute to project planning, risk assessment, and monitoring progress to ensure timely completion.

9\\.Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in business analysis and technology. Propose and implement process improvements and innovative solutions to drive efficiency and effectiveness within the organization.

title: Automation Engineer
company: Asiatic ( Complete solutions to liquid transfers and process solutions )
description:
**Job Description – Automation Engineer (Physical Site Support – Gujarat)**

**Company:** *Asiatic Traders – Application Engineering Division*  
**Location:** Gujarat (Anand / Baroda / Rajkot / Surat / Ahmedabad as per project requirement)  
**Department:** Automation \\& Commissioning  
**Reporting To:** Regional Project Lead / Director – Application Engineering

**Position Overview**

The **Automation Engineer – Physical Site Support** will be responsible for on\\-site implementation, testing, and troubleshooting of automation systems supplied by Asiatic Traders. The role involves close coordination with the central engineering team based in Indore and offers an opportunity to work directly on industrial automation projects in the **food, beverage, and process industries** across Gujarat.

This position is ideal for **young engineers** passionate about **PLC, HMI, SCADA, and instrumentation integration**, with opportunities for growth into design and commissioning roles after successful completion of the training period.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Support **installation, wiring verification, and commissioning** of automation panels and instruments at site.
* Perform **PLC logic testing, I/O mapping, and system validation** under guidance of senior engineers.
* Assist in **troubleshooting communication, sensor, and field issues** (Profinet / Modbus / Ethernet).
* Coordinate with **customers and internal teams** for smooth handover and documentation.
* Execute **Factory Acceptance Tests (FAT)** and **Site Acceptance Tests (SAT)** as per company standards.
* Maintain project records such as **as\\-built drawings, loop reports, and service logs**.
* Follow company **EHS and QAP procedures** during all site work.
* Support integration with **SCADA systems (FactoryTalk Optix / WinCC / FTView)**.
* Participate in technical discussions, client demonstrations, and training sessions.

**Skills \\& Competencies**

* Good understanding of **PLC / HMI programming (Siemens, Rockwell, or Festo)**.
* Strong grasp of **industrial communication protocols** (Profinet, Modbus, RS485\\).
* Ability to read **electrical wiring diagrams, P\\&IDs, and control logic charts**.
* Knowledge of **instrumentation (pressure, flow, level, and temperature transmitters)**.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills with a focus on real\\-time site challenges.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills to interact with clients and internal teams.
* Willingness to **travel extensively across Gujarat** for project execution and support.

**Qualification \\& Experience**

* **B.E./B.Tech** or **Diploma** in Electrical / Electronics / Instrumentation / Mechatronics.
* **0–3 years** of experience in industrial automation.
* **Fresher candidates** from reputed automation training institutes with **score above 7\\.0/10** are encouraged to apply.
* Hands\\-on exposure to **TIA Portal / Studio 5000 / CCW / FactoryTalk Optix** will be preferred.

**Work Environment**

* On\\-site work at customer facilities (food, beverage, dairy, or process plants).
* Reporting remotely to central engineering team at Indore.
* Training and periodic review sessions will be conducted through hybrid/online mode.
* Company\\-provided tools, safety gear, and travel allowance as per assignment.

**Compensation**

* Competitive package based on qualification and experience.
* **TA/DA, accommodation, and travel reimbursements** as per company norms.
* Performance review after successful completion of 6 months.

**Career Path**Automation Engineer (Site Support) → Commissioning Engineer → Senior Automation Engineer → Project Lead → Regional Manager**Why Join Asiatic Traders**

* Exposure to **end\\-to\\-end automation projects** with **Siemens, Rockwell, and Festo systems**.
* Opportunity to learn **SCADA–PLC–Instrumentation integration** in real industrial environments.
* Continuous mentoring by senior automation professionals.
* Opportunity for **career growth** into system design, SCADA programming, and project management roles.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: ₹221,644\\.04 \\- ₹360,000\\.00 per year

Work Location: In person

title: Project Manager - L1
description:
Job Description* 
Job Title: Project Manager \\- L1
Req Id: 74268
City: Hyderabad
State/Province: Telangana
Posting Start Date: 10/29/25
Wipro Limited (NYSE: WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading technology services and consulting company focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs. Leveraging our holistic portfolio of capabilities in consulting, design, engineering, and operations, we help clients realize their boldest ambitions and build future\\-ready, sustainable businesses. With over 230,000 employees and business partners across 65 countries, we deliver on the promise of helping our customers, colleagues, and communities thrive in an ever\\-changing world. For additional information, visit us at www.wipro.com.
Job Description:
**Job Description**
-------------------

  

**Role**

The purpose of the role is to manage delivery of a project driving operations and delivery governance, ensuring right talent supply chain to optimize customer satisfaction and cost of delivery


**͏**
-----

**Do**

* Delivery Management
* Ensure seamless delivery of the projects
* Deploy optimum project delivery structure post transition/ migration phase by evaluating the budget, costs, risks and staffing requirement
* Create quarterly project charter with well\\-defined weekly project trajectory as per the project specifications \\& requirements and ensure 100% adherence in terms of schedule, quality, efforts and costs

  

* Ensure 100% compliance to Project SLAs, information security protocols and etc (all customers contractual obligations)
* Monitor and take appropriate actions on internal and external audit findings to ensure no major non\\-compliance/ deviation from the SLA
* Liaise between customer and internal technical delivery team to drive project health by adhering to organizational norms of project metrics
* Drive various project related audits like quality, customer, ISO etc and ensure zero non\\-compliance
* Conduct periodic cadence with the quality team to take proactive measures to resolves issues/ possible escalations
* Conducts periodic cadence with Workforce Management Group (WMG) to ensure 100% fulfillment as per the program/ project requirement
* Regularly audit quality (QA) status of delivery and engage QA team to ensure adherence to Quality Assurance standards and processes
* Maintain project structure in Confluence \\& SAP in line with prevailing business requirements and norms
* Ensure expected ramp down (ERD) compliance as committed in MSA
* Client Relationship Management
* Engage with client to deploy opportunities to deploy multiple solutions within/ across SLs to create a stronger value proposition for clients

\\- Conduct regular customer connects (meetings/ visits/ video\\- conference) and participate in Management Review Meetings (MRM) with client management/engagement managers to understand customers current and future needs and seek feedback to improve delivery methodology/ timelines/ resource allocation
* Identify and close early warnings on a project to avoid any customer escalations
* Plan and conduct Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR) along with DMs/ ADH with the client management/ leadership team to drive improvement actions and mine for a new portfolio/ opportunity within the account
* Design and monitor project performance dashboards/ reports with the clients periodically
* Delivery governance across the project
* Create weekly/ monthly/ quarterly MIS and reports to monitor and track overall project
* Conduct periodic reviews with the delivery team on operational, quality and fulfillment parameters and new idea generation \\& its implementation on existing projects
* Identify and resolve potential risks or early warning signs on project delivery to drive for ZERO surprise escalations and eliminate any revenue leakage
* Escalate any deviations from the project charter to the delivery managers in terms of schedule, effort, cost, infrastructure from the project charter and minimize process exceptions and such deviations from the actual project plan
* Review and monitor revenue allocations/ realization to avoid OB revenue leakage
* Provide inputs to delivery leadership team on overall delivery performance parameters (project heath, utilization, realization etc) at project/ program level during reviews highlighting any critical project escalations and potential risks
**͏**
-----

* Operational Excellence
* Automation Focus
* Perform pareto analysis as per the no. of incidents received and accordingly identify automation opportunities and drive value adds across the project
* Deploy next generation hyper automation and crowdsourcing initiatives in coordination with Holmes RO team to enhance productivity, quality and speed of delivery

  

* Interact and engage with tools team to bring in new tools in the project to automate certain pointers/ elimination of any noise in the project
* Innovation Focus
* Brainstorm with the team to identify improvement opportunities and initiatives to further improve quality, delivery speed and productivity parameters
* Drive value adds and BVMs; ensure management showcases them to customer in MRM \\& QBR to drive growth
* Plan and conduct periodic idea campaigns to generate new solutions to the problems/ define better ways of working
* Drive and deploy Knowledge Management and sharing
* Contribute in internal knowledge sharing initiatives at Wipro by driving internal training sessions, best practices, learnings, value adds and BVMs and deploys best practices in various projects within own account
* Deploy the Wipro's knowledge management portal across the account and monitor \\& track trainings
* Capability Development and Talent Pipeline Creation
* Demand forecasting in line with business requirements
* Anticipate attrition and ensure right talent supply chain to deliver the project
* Spearhead quarterly demand forecasting and resource planning aligned to project requirements

  

* Create and deploy a workplan to fulfil the required demand from all the talent channels including external (lateral, contractors etc) hiring in coordination with WMG/ CWMG and Talent Acquisition team
* Anticipate new skills/ upcoming technologies required to deliver the project and ensure the team is trained or right talent is inducted into the project as per the skill requirements
* Drive 100% compliance on trainings and upskilling requirements
* Prioritize and identify essential and upcoming technical skills required across programs/ projects to facilitate and drive right supply chain
* Drive towards 100% mandatory training compliance for the target population within an account
* Plan and drive rotations for seed positions and ensure replacement plan to be arrived ahead of rotations
* Quarterly connect with critical talent to understand their career aspirations and create their learning maps along with project managers and HRBP
* Fresher engagement program
* Ensure a stable arrangement and assimilation of rookie within accounts in coordination with competency group team (classroom trainings/ e\\-learning, certifications, on the job training etc)
* Team Management
* Resourcing
* Forecast talent requirements as per the current and future business needs
* Hire adequate and right resources for the team
* Talent Management
* Ensure adequate onboarding and training for the team members to enhance capability \\& effectiveness
* Build an internal talent pool and ensure their career progression within the organization

  

* Manage team attrition
* Drive diversity in leadership positions
* Performance Management
* Set goals for the team, conduct timely performance reviews and provide constructive feedback to own direct reports
* Ensure that the Performance Nxt is followed for the entire team
* Employee Satisfaction and Engagement
* Lead and drive engagement initiatives for the team
* Track team satisfaction scores and identify initiatives to build engagement within the team
* Facilitate rewards and recognition to acknowledge the high performers in the team
**͏**
-----

Deliver  



  

1\\.
  

  

Delivery Management â€“ Client satisfaction
  

  

PCSAT, Brand score, no. of customer references, SDR/ QBR %, Pulse % satisfied (top 2 box), Zero surprise delivery escalation from the customer, adherence to project charter
  

  

2\\.
  

  

Delivery Management â€“ operational efficiency
  

  

Contractual adherence %, Quality index, Utilization %, cost of delivery target, overdue indent, 100% SLA compliance, PEI % target, 100% usage of click to bill, % SAP loss for T\\&M projects
  

  

3\\.
  

  

Delivery Management â€“ Financials
  

  

Revenue target achievement, Operating margin %, leakage from OB to revenue, revenue per employee, CR realization target, process exceptions to be minimized, bench cost % of total cost, underrun % target for FPP projects, effort saving through NG\\-1, NG\\-2 initiatives
  

  

5\\.
  

  

Capability Building
  

  

% attrition, critical talent attrition%, % trained on new age skills, % of team trained in necessary behavioural skills, diversity ratio, % localization targets by market, billable rookie ratio, rookie/NJNB assimilation TATs, offshore mix
  

  

6\\.
  

  

Team Management
  

  

Team attrition %, Employee satisfaction score  

  



**͏**
-----

Mandatory Skills: Oracle Fusion Apps \\- HCM .  

Experience: 8\\-10 Years .  

Reinvent your world. We are building a modern Wipro. We are an end\\-to\\-end digital transformation partner with the boldest ambitions. To realize them, we need people inspired by reinvention. Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA \\- as the world around us changes, so do we. Join a business powered by purpose and a place that empowers you to design your own reinvention. Come to Wipro. Realize your ambitions. title: Patent Analyst
description:
**Education:** B.E. / B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, PHD

**Who We Are**

We are a team of strategic thinkers who have led some of the world’s largest technology launches, litigations, and IP battles. Global technology leaders turn to us for guidance when developing new ideas, pursuing innovation, or seeking a competitive edge.

We belong to the **Intellectual Property (IP)** industry — one that’s ever\\-growing and at the forefront of technological evolution. We’re known to be *“the tip of the technological spear.”*

**What We’re Looking For**

At **GreyB**, we don’t just hire skill — we hire mindset. Here’s what we value (and what you’ll be tested for):

* **Quick on the Uptake:** Fast learner who can understand new technologies across diverse domains.
* **Creative Thinker:** Someone who can connect dots, recognize patterns, and think beyond the obvious.
* **Problem Solver:** Ability to approach real\\-world and client problems logically and strategically.
* **Perseverant:** You don’t give up until the goal is achieved — “hell\\-bent” on results.
* **Communicator:** Strong written and spoken communication skills — clarity and confidence matter.

**We Are Hiring For:**

**Research Analysts / Patent Analysts**

Ask yourself:

* Do you have strong technical acumen but don’t see yourself in a typical software or core engineering job?
* Do you crave analytical challenges and want a workplace that rewards curiosity and thinking?
* Do you want mentorship and a chance to grow faster than you imagined?

If yes, this is where you belong.

**What You’ll Gain (if you work hard enough!)**

In 2–3 years, you’ll acquire skills that even top B\\-school graduates envy. You’ll dive right into meaningful work, solving real problems for real clients.

* **Technology Expertise:** Use your engineering foundation to understand inventions, research technologies, and translate findings into actionable reports.
* **Project Management:** Manage multiple projects with different timelines, learning planning, prioritization, and execution.
* **Leadership:** Get exposure to strategy discussions with senior management and take ownership of outcomes.
* **Business Acumen:** Learn how technology drives business growth and operational excellence.
* **Teamwork \\& Collaboration:** Work with cross\\-functional professionals, learning how to leverage team strengths.
* **Problem\\-Solving Mindset:** Tackle complex technical and business challenges creatively.
* **Adaptability:** Stay on top of emerging technologies and shifting global trends.

**How It Works**

* You’ll receive hands\\-on training in **Intellectual Property** and **technology research**.
* You’ll work on **live client projects** under the mentorship of a Project Manager.
* You’ll be encouraged to explore efficient and creative ways to gather and analyze information.
* You’ll contribute not just analysis — but ideas that add real value to the client.
* You’ll be expected to maintain top\\-notch quality, speed, and clarity in your work.

This job is **not for everyone.**  
If you’re looking for a 9\\-to\\-5 comfort zone, this isn’t it.
