title: Operation Analyst || Night Shift
description:
**Operations Analyst** 

**About Houzeo** 

Houzeo is a 100% online real estate marketplace. From listing to closing, Houzeo technology makes home selling and buying the easiest it has ever been. Users can list their homes for a flat fee, connect with local real estate pros, and find their dream home on Houzeo.com.  
Founded in Manhattan, New York, with additional offices in Charlotte, North Carolina (US), and Mumbai, India, Houzeo is led by our founder, Amit Dhameja. With an Ivy League MBA and a background in finance, real estate, and tech, Mr. Dhameja spearheads this profitable startup.

**The Houzeo Universe**

Houzeo’s product universe includes a wide range of products and services, including:  
● Houzeo IntelliList Listing: This tool auto\\-assigns the right paperwork for a seller’s property based on location. It’s the fastest way to list a home!  
● Houzeo Showings: A digital showing scheduling app designed for sellers. Buyers and agents can directly request showings once a seller verifies them!  
● Houzeo Offers: An offer management tool to evaluate, compare and counter offers received on a property.  
Sellers can request the highest and best offers within seconds!  
● Houzeo DigiTransact: DigiTransact lets sellers maneuver the real estate transaction with milestones, tasks, notifications and reminders seamlessly. No more friction!  
● Houzeo Dream Homes: Aims to help home buyers find their dream homes, make an offer, or start their mortgage pre\\-approval journey.  
● Houzeo Mobile App: A comprehensive mobile app that lets home sellers and buyers  
● Houzeo Home Worth Calculator: A free home value calculator that helps homeowners estimate how valuable their property is.  
● Houzeo Mortgage Calculator: A mortgage payment estimator that helps potential home borrowers understand monthly payments and amortisation schedules for free.  
● Houzeo Closing Costs Calculator: The most advanced closing cost estimator for helping buyers and sellers understand what they have to pay on closing day.

**About the Operations Team** 

At Houzeo, our Operations Team powers the engine behind Customer Success, Vendor Relations, and Billing. They ensure smooth processes, accurate billing, and top\\-notch support. If you're organised, solution\\-driven, and ready to make an impact, this is your crew.

**About the Role: Are You the One?**

Houzeo is looking for a detail\\-oriented and tech\\-savvy Document Automation Executive to streamline and automate broker\\-provided documents with speed and accuracy. In this role, you’ll take full ownership of the automation process—ensuring error\\-free delivery while collaborating with broker partners for feedback and approvals.  
You’ll not only work with tools and systems but also play a key role in enhancing onboarding experiences and driving efficiency across teams.If you enjoy problem\\-solving, working with automation tools, and building scalable processes, we’d love to connect with you!

**Your Mission, Should You Choose to Accept It**

✅ Take complete ownership of document automation using in\\-house tools and software ✅ Deliver automation tasks on time with high accuracy and minimal supervision  
✅ Communicate with clients (primarily via email) to gather feedback and approvals on forms  
✅ Ensure correct document setup and service configuration across all client accounts  
✅ Streamline vendor onboarding by simplifying setup and documentation  
✅ Create and maintain SOPs and knowledge bases for automated processes  
✅ Respond to routine vendor emails while maintaining professional communication standards  
✅ Continuously identify and implement workflow improvements to enhance client experience  
✅ Analyse existing processes and contribute to optimisation and automation initiatives ✅ Handle ad\\-hoc data and process analysis requests with precision

**What You Bring**

Graduated in any discipline  
Excellent attention to detail and strong problem\\-solving skills  
Strong written and verbal communication abilities  
Proficiency in MS Excel or Google Sheets; comfortable with software platforms  
Basic understanding of inventory systems, databases, or similar tools (a plus)  
Highly organised with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines  
Able to work effectively under pressure in a dynamic, fast\\-changing environment  
Positive, customer\\-first attitude with professional communication skills  
Willingness to work the Night Shift (required)

**Nice to Haves**

Prior experience in process automation, data management, or client onboarding  
Strong sense of ownership, accountability, and adaptability  
Proactive mindset with eagerness to learn and adopt new tools \\& technologies

**What We Offer** 

Exposure to real\\-time billing systems, vendor portals, and reconciliation processes. Opportunities to work cross\\-functionally with Finance, Operations, and Tech teams  
Data\\-driven culture focused on automation, accuracy and continuous improvement. Access to industry\\-leading tools like Excel, Google Sheet , and SQL\\-based reporting, Monthly team\\-building activities and performance recognition initiatives

title: Performance Marketing Executive
description:
**About D’Moksha Homes**

D’Moksha Homes is a purpose\\-driven premium home décor brand that began in the US and is now redefining how India shops for curtains and home textiles. We’re India’s first “Curtain Shopping at Home” brand — combining design expertise, AI\\-powered visualization, and ethical craftsmanship to make home styling effortless and inspiring.

Every product you help market supports women artisans and funds girl child education through our initiative, **D’Moksha Cares**.

**Role Overview**

We’re looking for a **Performance Marketing \\& Analytics Intern** who’s passionate about data\\-driven marketing and wants to build a long\\-term career in growth marketing. You’ll work directly with the founding team and marketing leads to plan, execute, and optimize paid campaigns across **Meta, Google, and other digital platforms**, while building analytical frameworks to measure ROI and customer acquisition metrics.

This is an internship designed to transition into a **full\\-time role within 6 months** based on performance and learning agility.

* Basic understanding of ad funnels, tracking pixels, and attribution.
* Curious, proactive, and willing to experiment, learn, and take ownership.
* Creative thinker who enjoys working in a fast\\-paced, startup environment.

**What You’ll Gain**

* Hands\\-on mentorship from founders and senior growth leaders.
* Real exposure to **end\\-to\\-end campaign management** (strategy → execution → analysis).

title: Associate Healthcare Research & Data Analyst
description:
We are looking for an Associate Healthcare Research and Data Analyst to join our Medtech Insights team in Bangalore. This is an amazing opportunity to work on syndicated market research reports and custom project for medical device space. The team consists of 48 \\- 50 people and is reporting to the Director, Medtech Insights. We have great skill sets in market research and forecasting and we would love to speak with you if you have skills in data research \\& analysis and content generation.

**About You – experience, education, skills, and accomplishments**

* Master’s degree (MA, MS in life sciences or MBA)/ Pharm D/ PHD.
* Freshers or 6 months of relevant job experience
* Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including using pivot tables and advanced formulas such as VLOOKUP, effective data organization strategies etc.
* Highly self\\-motivated and able to work independently or with a team to produce high quality deliverables that require little rework.
* Strong critical thinking and analytical skills
* Mature communicator capable of handling high\\-profile clients from Fortune 500 companies
* Strong presentation and written communication skills  

Experience working with numbers and forecasting models

**It would be great if you also had . . .**

* Qualification or experience in life sciences will be preferred.
* Well\\-developed expertise in market research methodologies or related job experience
* Ability to handle tight deadlines.
* Excellent creative problem\\-solving skills.
* Business acumen that helps support sales success, ongoing improvements, and relationships with internal and external stakeholder.

**What will you be doing in this role?**

* Interviewing industry participants and related medical professionals
* Searching Clarivate's proprietary in\\-house research repository/library for relevant data
* Using financial, regulatory, and government documents to find key medical approval data.
* Model and forecast medical and healthcare markets, including but not limited to:
* Integrating highly disparate data points into a unified market model
* Interpreting qualitative data into useable quantitative measures
* Creating hypotheses on market and competitive dynamics based on primary and secondary data.
* Using MS Excel and database programs to manipulate large amounts of data.
* Forecasting markets based on expectations, new product developments, and other market disruptors.
* Identifying data trends and outliers using time\\-series tables and graphs
* Write and prepare comprehensive research reports.


**About the Team**


The Medtech Insights team is an essential part of the broader Medtech team’s data\\-driven culture and regularly contributes its subject matter expertise to other teams within the organization.

**Hours of Work:** 12:00 PM to 9:00 PM

**Work Mode:** Hybrid (Monday to Friday) **Location:** Bangalore


At Clarivate, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities for all qualified persons with respect to hiring, compensation, promotion, training, and other terms, conditions, and privileges of employment. We comply with applicable laws and regulations governing non\\-discrimination in all locations.
company_description: Clarivate is a global leader in providing trusted information and insights to accelerate the pace of innovation.

title: Analyst - REACH and Japan Screening
description:
Work Your Magic with us!

  

Ready to explore, break barriers, and discover more? We know you’ve got big plans – so do we! Our colleagues across the globe love innovating with science and technology to enrich people’s lives with our solutions in Healthcare, Life Science, and Electronics. Together, we dream big and are passionate about caring for our rich mix of people, customers, patients, and planet. That\\`s why we are always looking for curious minds that see themselves imagining the unimageable with us.

 **Your Role:**

* Basic understanding of REACH Regulation, different types of Dossiers and their purpose. Familiar with tools such as IUCLID, REACH\\-IT, and UK REACH.
* Possesses foundational knowledge of global regulations: CLP, GHS, PDSCL, ISHL, PRTR, CSCL, FSL, and familiarity with EzCric and SBCT databases.
* Interpreting data in SAP EHS, primarily under supervision, ensuring adherence to data standards.
* Understands basic regulatory data in SAP and has a high\\-level understanding of the Japan screening process, while requiring direction for classification and chemical analysis tasks in accordance with established guidelines.
* Works to develop competency and reliability in supporting regulatory data management functions.
* Aware of the formatting, document creation, import and export of all MS Office tools like MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
* Able to identify and read relevant MANGO documents for corresponding processes, with an understanding of the Quality Management System ISO 9001:2015 and the ability to perform basic KPI reporting.
* Assist in the Japan screening process to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. Conduct testing and validation of the SBCT tool to support effective data management.
* Provide support for various projects to ensure timely completion and successful outcomes, while training new joiners on regulatory processes and tools to enhance team competency and assisting in process improvement initiatives to increase efficiency in compliance activities.
* Assist in the creation and maintenance of Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) related to compliance to ensure consistency and adherence to regulatory standards.

 **Who you are:**

* M.Sc. Chemistry (Organic Chemistry/ Analytical Chemistry is plus) or Masters in Life Science (Biochemistry, Biotechnology, Microbiology)
* 1\\-3 Years of experience and Freshers are also welcomed.
* REACH Regulations and SAP EHS is Good to have
* Japanese Language is additional advantage.

 **What we offer:** We are curious minds that come from a broad range of backgrounds, perspectives, and life experiences. We celebrate all dimensions of diversity and believe that it drives excellence and innovation, strengthening our ability to lead in science and technology. We are committed to creating access and opportunities for all to develop and grow at your own pace. Join us in building a culture of inclusion and belonging that impacts millions and empowers everyone to work their magic and champion human progress!


Apply now and become a part of our diverse team!

title: Financial Analyst
description:
**Job Summary:**

The Financial Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing financial data, preparing performance reports, and supporting the management team in decision\\-making processes related to equity, grey, and commodity markets. The ideal candidate should have strong analytical skills, advanced Excel expertise, and sound knowledge of financial markets.

**Key Responsibilities:**

· Perform detailed analysis of market data across equity, commodity, and grey market segments.

· Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly performance and financial reports using advanced Excel tools.

· Track market trends, company performance, and sectoral movements to support investment decisions.

· Assist in portfolio tracking, profit\\-loss analysis, and return optimization.

· Support management in preparing data\\-driven presentations and dashboards.

· Analyse trading data to identify patterns, risks, and opportunities.

· Maintain and update internal databases related to trades and investments.

· Collaborate with the operations and research teams to streamline data flow and reporting accuracy.

· Ensure data accuracy and timely submission of analytical reports.

· Provide actionable insights for business improvement and strategic planning.

**Requirements:**

· Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Commerce, Economics, or a related field (MBA/PGDM preferred).

· Minimum 3 years of experience in financial or market analysis.

· **Expertise in Advanced Excel** (Pivot Tables, Macros, Power Query, and Data Visualization).

· Strong understanding of **Equity, Commodity, and Grey Markets**.

· Excellent analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.

· Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks effectively.

· Female candidates preferred.

Job Types: Full\\-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: ₹137,855\\.71 \\- ₹702,908\\.81 per year

Work Location: In person

title: Business / Quality Analyst
description:
**Job Title:** Business / Quality Analyst

**Company:** ZapTech Pvt. Ltd. (An ISO\\-Certified Company)

Amanora Town Center, Hadapsar, Pune – 411028, Maharashtra, India

**Job Type:** Full\\-Time \\| Entry Level

**Salary:** ₹3\\.2 LPA – ₹3\\.5 LPA

**About Us:**  
ZapTech Pvt. Ltd. is an ISO\\-certified BPO \\& KPO service provider delivering high\\-quality solutions to the U.S. Accounts Receivable Management (ARM) industry. We are expanding our team and looking for ambitious MBA graduates with strong business acumen to join us as Business / Quality Analysts. This is an excellent opportunity to begin your career in analytics, research, and quality processes within a professional business environment.

**Role Overview:**  
As a Business / Quality Analyst, you will analyze data, monitor process quality, conduct research, and deliver actionable insights that drive business performance. This entry\\-level position is ideal for candidates eager to develop expertise in analytics, business research, and process improvement while applying their business knowledge to real\\-world operations.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Analyze and interpret data to generate actionable business insights
* Conduct quality checks and audits to ensure process excellence
* Support research, reporting, and decision\\-making initiatives
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to enhance service delivery
* Present findings and recommendations clearly to stakeholders

**Qualifications \\& Skills:**

* Education: MBA (Mandatory) – Specialization in Data Analytics, Marketing, International Business, or Operations
* Experience: Freshers or candidates with up to 12 months of experience in Business Analyst, Research Analyst, or Quality Analyst roles
* Strong business acumen with the ability to connect data insights to business outcomes
* Excellent analytical, problem\\-solving, and decision\\-making abilities
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)

**Work Schedule:**

* Training Shift: 2:00 PM – 11:00 PM
* Post\\-Training Shift: 6:00 PM – 3:00 AM (Rotational / Flexible work schedule)

**What We Offer:**

* Opportunity to work with a leading BPO \\& KPO service provider in the U.S. ARM industry
* Career growth and continuous learning opportunities
* Cab or travelling allowance
* Free meal

title: Credit Analyst
description:
**Organization**: Tricon Energy India, Mumbai

 **Department**: Credit

 **Designation**: Credit Analyst

 **Roles \\& Responsibilities**


* Analyze customer financial statements and authorize or recommend credit limits.
* Liaise with Tricon Traders , Customers, and Banks to discuss credit matters, resolve issues and verify financial and credit transactions
* Handling LC transactions, negotiate rates with Banks for discounting and structuring of transactions
* Regular reporting to the Credit Manager of global exposures
* Monitor exposure to credit limits
* Order credit reports as necessary
* Manage credit data in JD Edwards
* Provide credit references to 3rd parties
* Assist in tracking and collecting past due invoices
* Sharing Daily collection Reports, AR outstanding Reports
* Monthly MIS wrt Sales and AR
* AR Reconciliations
* Various ad\\-hoc projects as required

  


**Desired Skills and Experience:**

  

* A person with 1\\-2 year of experience in Accounting / Credit or a Fresher with good academics (From Finance background)
* High level of Intelligence; highly analytical and detail oriented
* Able to present well; Good communication skills
* 4 year degree in accounting, finance or related field from a top school
* Strong excel skills
* This is a client facing role, the candidate must be comfortable dealing with and presenting to high level executives

  


**Reporting to: Director\\- Finance**

 **About Tricon Energy**

Tricon is a physical commodity trading firm. Headquartered in Houston, Texas, Tricon has offices in 30 countries and conducts business in over 100 countries. Tricon facilitates global commerce through the physical movement of petrochemicals and plastics. Value is created for both buyers and sellers by Tricon’s handling of every step of the transaction and shipping process. Rapid growth is a primary goal and Tricon is looking for individuals who will continue to contribute to this energetic expansion.
